name: Ch?k?soku GranDoll
description:
Based on the anime Hyper Speed GranDoll, Ch?k?soku GranDoll is an action, side-scrolling platformer with metroidvania elements and influences of Mega Man. The story is about Hikaru, a high school girl, who discovers that she is a surviving member of a royal lineage of aliens from a distant planet and is the protector of powerful armor that can control the fate of the galaxy. It is up to Hikaru to defend Earth from an alien invasion.

The game is an action platformer with elements of a run 'n' gun game where you play as Hikaru. Game mechanics include: a grappling hook, collecting key cards, and acquiring power-ups after boss fights to strength her armor and gain more powerful combat tactics. The game also features cut scenes in the style of anime.
